title: Please Help
body: As of today I am apparently permanently banned despite little to no behavioral strikes against me. I believe this may be a mistake of some sort. When I went to check the email connected to my league account, it was not the same as the one I registered with. With the slight information given I can tell it was an email I have never had access to due to it being a Yahoo email and I tend to use Gmail for simplicity sake. I'd appreciate any responses and it's truly upsetting that I may have lost not only countless hours put in to the game but also north of $500 spent.

replies.body: Due to the nature of sensitive account information, we'd like to help with your specific issue individually through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Reach out to us there and we can provide context for you!  You'll be in good hands, and we'll respond to your ticket asap!
